title: Manual ZIP export: frontend/src/components folder (file-by-file)

requirements.text: Export the entire `frontend/src/components` folder in the manual ZIP bundle by outputting every file under `frontend/src/components/**` one by one, preserving exact relative paths and file contents.
acceptanceCriteria: All files and subfolders under `frontend/src/components` are included (e.g., `auth/*`, `layout/*`, `projects/*`, `screenplay/*`).
Each file is output with its full path (starting at `frontend/src/components/...`) and complete, unmodified content.
No files outside `frontend/src/components` are included in this batch.
Output is organized so a developer can reconstruct the folder locally with the same structure.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.

Do not request edits to immutable frontend paths: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Do not introduce new app features; this request is only for manual export/packaging of existing files.
nonGoals: Changing UI behavior, styles, routing, authentication, or storage logic.
Exporting other folders (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks`, `frontend/src/lib`, `backend`, `public`, root config files) in this batch.
